definitions.definition: connected with drawings and design, especially in the production of books, magazines, websites, etc.
very clear and full of details, especially about something unpleasant

examples.text: He kept telling us about his operation, in the most **graphic detail**.
This is a very graphic account of life in Victorian England.

wordOrigin: mid 17th cent.: via Latin from Greek graphikos, from graphē ‘writing, drawing’.
